content.query:
select *
from   MonthlyTransactions mts,
       account act,
       baserate bsr,
       LoanType ltyp,
       BusinessProduct bp,
       StagingReferenceRegionLookup srl,
       date dt
where  mts.AccountNumber = act.AccountNumber
and    bsr.BaseRateCode  = mts.RateCode
and    ltyp.LoanType = mts.LoanType
and    bp.BusinessProductGroup = mts.BusinessProduct
and    srl.region = mts.Securityregion
and    dt.date = mts.PeriodDate
